summary: Now Lydia looks Younger and Prettier. And she now has a better voice.
descriptionHtml:
(Sorry for my english, I\'m french xD)
------------------------

Now Lydia looks prettier, and sexier, and she has a better voice... No real description needed, just look at the screens.
Thx to foretrenty (NPC Editor tool)

Now a voice-only version for these who just wants to change her voice.

She also has purple eyes, for that you\'ll need the Purple eyes mod.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1763] Purple Eyes mod by DalekBarbarian [/url]
Thx to DalekBarbarian
 If you don\'t take it, she\'ll has blue eyes.

And Better Females by Bella :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812] Better Females by Bella [/url]
Thx to BellaGail.

Classic installation, put \'meshes\' folder into \'Data\', same for the .esp !
Enjoy !

- Hyrul

Also see my other mods :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22685] Blood and Dark - Hide armor Retexture [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6292] Morrowinds levelup sound replacement [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5076] Menu music - Dovahkiin - Metal remix [/url]
author: Hyrul
